# Change Log

## 0.5.0

* new class `LazyInstance`

## 0.4.0

* new class `AssertRaises`

## 0.3.0

* `make_mock` now passes its arguments to `unittest.mock.Mock`
* new method `TestCase.assert_not_called`

## 0.2.0

* added functions
  * `cover_typing`
  * `make_callable`
  * `make_mock`
  * `make_type`
* added classes
  * `PatcherFactory`

## 0.1.0

* Initial development version
